title: Samsung says Digital Car Key support is now available on more Genesis, BMW, and Kia vehicles
content:
Smartphone makers have been working on the ability to unlock your car with nothing more than a smartphone, and Samsung has helped lead the charge on the Android side of things. Now, it appears that the list of supported Digital Car Key vehicles has been expanded with new vehicles from Genesis and Kia.

moreâ€¦

The post Samsung says Digital Car Key support is now available on more Genesis, BMW, and Kia vehicles appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has apparently expanded support for its Digital Car Key tools to more vehicles from Genesis, Kia, and BMW.
